720070f-a.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Sullivan Street
720070f-a.text:
0rand Street, north side, east from Sullivan Street.
About 1927.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
720070f-a.folder: Grand Street & Sullivan Street, Manhattan, NY

709253f-a.title: Manhattan : 6th Avenue - Grand - Canal Streets.
709253f-a.text:
Sixth Ave., east side, south from and including Grand, to and
including Canal Streets. Also shown is Grand Street, south side,
east from Sixth Ave., to and including Thompson Street. Nos. 29-31
Grand Street, adjoining and west of the S.W. corner of Thompson
Street are frame houses. Also shown is the rear of St. Alphonsus
Roman Catholic Church and School, through clearance for the
widening of Sixth Ave.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 307.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
709253f-a.folder: Manhattan : 6th Avenue & Grand & Canal Streets., Manhattan, NY

709250f-a.title: Manhattan : 6th Avenue - Grand Street.
709250f-a.text:
(1)
Sixth Ave., east side, at Grand Street.
March 19, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, from a different angle, and at an earlier date.
October 18, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
A more extensive view to show the apex of this triangular plot, formed
by Thonpson Street (right). Shown on the east side of the latter is the
rear of St. Alphonsus R.C. Church.
August 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPODUCTIONS.
709250f-a.folder: Manhattan : 6th Avenue & Grand Street., Manhattan, NY

709251f-b.title: Manhattan : 6th Avenue - N. Canal Street - Grand Street
709251f-b.text:
(1)
Sixth Ave., east side, north from but not including Canal to and
including Grand Street. Note frame houses (No's 29 and 31 Grand
Street) between Sixth Ave. and Thompson Street.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 293.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, a further view.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Nuseum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 582.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
709251f-b.folder: Manhattan : 6th Avenue & N. Canal Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY

709248f-a.title: Manhattan: 6th Avenue - Canal Street - Grand Street
709248f-a.text:
Sixth Avenue, east side, north from above Canal Street, show-
ing constructional details of this new diagonal extension and its
subway underground. Grand Street is in the midground and the build-
ings there face on both sides of same. These extend east to Thompson
Street. View 2 is photographed at Grand Street.
October 19, 1928
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
709248f-a.folder: 6th Avenue & Canal Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY

723460f-a.title: Manhattan: Sullivan Street - Grand Street
723460f-a.text:
Sullivan Street, west side, north from and including No. 26, north
of Grand Street, seen from the S.E. corner, shortly before de-
molition of the buildings in the left foreground. One of the old
houses to go will be 4d Sullivan Street (42 Watts Street), the
frame house at the N.W. corner of Watts Street, the first intersection
nnorth of the observer.
1926.
MAY BE REPhOUUGED.
723460f-a.folder: Sullivan Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY
